thread.title: SoftNAS Expands Executive Team - NewsFactor
thread.title_full: SoftNAS Expands Executive Team - NewsFactor - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: NewsFactor
title: SoftNAS Expands Executive Team - NewsFactor
text:
SoftNAS Expands Management Team as Part of Continued Growth Strategy -- Customer-centered 30-year technology veteran new VP of Business Development , today announced Michael Richtberg, a 30 year veteran in IT transformation has joined SoftNAS as Vice President of Business Development. Richtberg will lead business development to enable new market segment expansion and will report directly to the President and COO.
 NewsFactor.
